title: New hybrid closed loop insulin pump proves hard to use for some patients with diabetes

title_detail.value: New hybrid closed loop insulin pump proves hard to use for some patients with diabetes

summary: Among first-time users of a new insulin pump that automatically delivers insulin to people with type 1 diabetes, nearly one-fifth stopped using the device, primarily because of difficulties meeting the technical demands system, researchers say.

summary_detail.value: Among first-time users of a new insulin pump that automatically delivers insulin to people with type 1 diabetes, nearly one-fifth stopped using the device, primarily because of difficulties meeting the technical demands system, researchers say.
